Invocation Name: the ramayana guide
des:
The Ramayana is certainly one of the world's oldest legends. Modern scholars claim that it was first composed around 300 BC. This skill will give you the insight of some amazing facts associated with the Indian mythology book the Ramayana. 

This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
